get.summary: Get member benefit accumulators i.e. deductible and out of pocket costs.
get.description: This API provides all of the accumulator information for a member. This is based on in_network vs out_of_network, deductible vs max out of pocket and individual vs family. The benefit period can also be used to identify past year vs current year costs.

parameters.name: benefit_period_id
parameters.description: ID of the Benefit Period being returned

200.description: provides accumulated values and the benefit period.

count.description: Count representing the total number of objects available to be returned in the results array

next.description: query identifier defined by the api developer for getting the next set of records

previous.description: query identifier defined by the api developer for getting the previous set of records
